PositionHistory.Title: Data Scientist
PositionHistory.Description:
March'19 Data Scientist Responsibilities include: * Data analysis and ML model implementation in R and Python * Data engineering, providing assistance in product deployment and building new feature in the product. * Antibiotic Panel Prediction using recommendation system * Outlier Detection for Bacteria Prevalence * Trend-line analysis for detection of increase in antibiotic bug resistance * APIs and ETL implementation in Python
